mapper.select:
select
from sys_fans
where openId like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or nickName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or mobile like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select
from sys_fans where 1 = 1
and (openId like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or nickName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or mobile like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
ORDER BY id
limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select count(*) from sys_fans where 1 = 1
and (openId like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or nickName like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or mobile like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )
